column5: But if you guys can say it, why can't I? Sounds like segregation to me.
You didn't draw this...it's in r/horror_art
I like your style

I don't know how to tell my doctor I want to get off of it, I've gained 30lbs and I'm always drowsy, but he's going to say my weight is fine  I mean I have 0 hallucinations or paranoia and he's going to try to convince me being overweight is okay

Hey jack

Stay on your meds and don't go off track

Our lives are similar but I gotta say a dog I lack

It's good to meet a fellow schizophrenic

Hope you aren't still driving out of town to work in this epidemic

It's good to care

But before we contracted this disease we had a glimpse at our potential

And to me that's just not fair

It all feels strange

Knowing my original potential is now out of range

Glad I caught you before the phone interview, really lay it on, I can't stress enough how much you need to stress that you are INCAPABLE of working don't say " oh I might be able to do this but whatever" , you CANT do ANY job because VOICES PARANOIA ANXIETY ect, I know people in my support group that can't function as well as me with thier schizo and they were denied because they felt the need to tell them what they thought they could do, they said things like "if I had a job from home" or " I was doing really well in school" don't tell them those things IDC if it's true being schizo with documentation and a letter from your psychologist is a sure pass if you pass the phone interview, no pressure just tell them I can't do this that and the other, because of voices, paranoia, anxiety, and whatever else you have, the process takes about 2 to 3 months for your phone interview, give it another month to know if your approved, and what they also don't tell you is in the first payment you will get a one time payment of 780$ times every month you have been without a job
That's cool, I don't have anywhere I need to be, so I'm fine in quarantine, can't think of anywhere I would want to be...
Is he schizo?
That's good...something new to look forward to I guess...means in 5 years il be seeing them too...only the best for us schizos...
Thanks!
Sure I'm on PS4 and I like a lot of different music
Because you have a mental disorder, tell your parents you need to talk to a psychiatrist, there's nothing you can do about the past
All schizos have tricked themselves into believing that they were going to die at least once in their life, come to the realization that if you die you die, and go to sleep...
That's great korba

What you need right now is sleep, so I'm going to tell you something all us schizos have processed in our mind that makes us numb, go to sleep if you die you die, listen to this song and get some rest [worry about it after you get some rest you will be fine](https://youtu.be/Bag1gUxuU0g)
My favorite color is black, it's most people's favorite color they just don't know it, wouldn't you agree?

Your delusional, nobody is special your not special I'm not special there are no aliens and you live a normal life, go buy a vape pen from the gas station and take a drag, you should feel relieved delusions of grandeur can weigh you down

Tell your parents what's going on look up videos on YouTube on being admitted to a inpatient treatment at a behavioral health center  and tell your parents you need to get on some meds that will aliviate your paranoia
Yea I've been there, it's a very common delusion, the delsions go first then the paranoia but you don't really notice where you are in the world until atleast 3 months after the paranoia is gone
Yes it's fine but never smoke weed
Don't live stream anything you do while your in psychosis...
Reflect upon yourself and your actions and how others see you, this will bring you clarity...
There is no code...to many variables...
Sounds peaceful...
Thanks
This song captures that sentiment very well [born to die](https://youtu.be/Bag1gUxuU0g)

I really find music to be like a drug, it makes you visualize a scenario and carries you down that path, it's more of an escape and I would recommend integrating that time you spend with other things like movies books or video games, because for me that false scenario I drag myself into where I'm the one who makes that music, that train of thought just feels unhealthy

Hey Luke, definitely get a game system and talk to people online I suggest a ps4, talking to random normies really helps let you know your not that different and would make you a lot less dependent on your parents,
Elaborate on what you consider a *special interest* cause right now I don't know if you mean, drawing seems to be common in schizos so is listening to music for an extended amount of time
Your boyfriend will disappear soon also...
Best Tsunade cosplay I've seen, I hope they never do a live action but you could get the role
Lmao first time taking Adderall was way better than first time with coke
Your conceited if you think knowing the reference in that double entendre gives you a higher IQ than anyone else
I can tell he off his meds...
I feel like only delusional people feel this way, but once your out of the delusions and reflecting you appreciate the people telling you your delusions were not real...
That's assault...
Nobody watches you on tv, it's a common delusion of grandeur, try and get on a medication that makes these delusions go away, tell your psychiatrist
He's the chosen one...the one we all wear masks, so he doesn't have to...
This may sound weird but my best advice is get a ps4 get online and talk to some people while your playing online, that's a easy way to have social interaction,

You don't need to go in for that job, if your in a mental state like that then going to work wouldnt be smart at all, you need time off if money is a problem then get on disability, being suicidal in a schizophrenic requires a 6 month break from everything if you ask me
Yea that would piss me off, I don't tell anyone, it's not their business
Stupid...
This is stupid...
Takashi69
Yea, those are delusions listen to your mom and get some help, see your psychiatrist and get on some meds it will work.
The guy has a few videos with crack heads...he should be shit...
Same here...
Used to be able to smoke and relax laugh ect when I was 16 turned 17 and it all went downhill got diagnosed at 18
Hahahaha this girl disgusts me...
I'm in the same boat I used to have so much potential took a 4yr break in school and now I'm trying to get my bachelor's... schizophrenia...smh...
Gay...

Yea I draw when I'm in there too...they lamenated mine and put it on the wall...hope I never have to see it again..."my boy builds coffins, he builds them all day, but it's not just for work and it isn't for play,he crafts every one with love and with care, and then it's thrown in the ground it just isn't fair,
[my boy builds coffins, great song](https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=clF_Df_Jrm0&feature=share)
You don't have to hear voices to be schizophrenic, look up the definition, what your experiencing fits right into that definition

Very common bro, delusions of grandeur happen to all schizophrenics, I've thought similar things to what you described and trust me your better off knowing your not *the one* when you finally get that over with you'll feel relieved Ive thought I was going to save the world but once medicated I was think damn I'm just a average Joe...and that was disappointing but I'd rather relax than have that stress on me anyway...let your delusions of grandeur go, you'll feel better
It was a good video, I don't even tell people I'm schizophrenic, becuz the spectrum is so large they get the wrong impression from what they've heard
Sounds like the parents couldn't relate with thier adopted African child, she ended up with a trashy loser wanna be thug and they didn't know what to do
When it's bad both when it's mild just inside my head
Bob talked?

Rofl that was funny...it's good you have someone to talk to about these things...I'm glad I don't have my counselors number it would look a lot like this rofl, if I had a dollar for every time my animals tried to talk to me...
Lmao "seriously bro"....that is Gaara if he could control his tailed beast...bro...
That was me...I'm that guy...
I have lived in the country...this looks like a bad time...along with tubein...fishin...and all the other bullshit that country people do...
Florida...
I'm in the same boat... Kardashians...Jenner's...gotta be one of them...
Lol you said that like you were confirming...."as the long beach meth head"
Yea everybody feels like a fat ass when they gain weight I feel you like we were skinny and now we're average and I "gotta" get back down, and I will lol

Yea I've been on it for five months now and Ive gained 15lbs my appetite is much more than it used to be and I have a fast metabolism but this is the most I've ever weighed in my life I was 130 now I'm 145

Lol were on the same meds...zyprexa? Olanzapine? I'm sure yea same happened to me... appetite is crazy I know exactly where your coming from, i was skinny and I saw myself as fat after 2months but I was average and I wanted to be skinny again so I started eating healthier, dont switch meds or get off of them give yourself some time to change your eating habits
Psychedelics put me back in psychosis even smoking weed makes me hear voices, prior to being diagnosed I loved smoking weed, can't do it anymore
Yea I've thought similar, tell your parents your hearing voices and want to talk to a psychiatrist...they will be able to help
Nice...I'm currently on call of duty, Minecraft is too repetitive
Nobody is after you, I've had these delusions at some point delusions of grandeur and paranoia are common with us, these things you believe are not real
I can't get off of mine...my doc said I will be on it for life...the people I talk to in meeting have been on theirs all their life some get nerve deteriorating diseases from it

Great job bro...I too live on my own with schizophrenia...every once in awhile someone tries to get me to smoke some weed and I think "what could go wrong"...but I never partake..and nothing goes wrong...take your meds and don't smoke weed and you'll be fine
Hahaha I've been there..."hey sis...the cats talking to you..."

Look at me now...Chris Brown ft Busta Rhymes
https://youtu.be/5CO-yHU-vWA
Florida man on drugs...
Baby dies...karma disproven
It's Julia, from The Project Girls.
You gotta say *HE WOULD" give toilet paper and a donut for giving HIM a blowjob...not the other way around...that's how the joke works...

She needs meds...I feel sorry for her, she's probably making a excuse for everything in her life and that's not healthy, I feel bad about my past delusions too, but I've been other people's delusions several times, I remember being at the inpatient treatment center and it happened every day, really gave me a good perspective on my own bullshit
Am I the only one who hates adults cosplaying MHA teens, they look old...
She just wants Justin Timberlake...
Lol...bro thier talking about rasengan not shadow clone...

My advice would be draw it twice as big and shrink it...the eyes aren't anime pupils the eye shape is fine but the pupils aren't anime, looks good, you should add the needles this time, great improvements
Do they mean the lid, or the seat? I always get confused, nobody ever told me this rule before...
But she looks ugly? It's not different...it's ugly...
I thought it was a great show...
Something tells me she bought that to resell it...
Hahaha, I have no fucking clue..." What's wrong with you?" He said some demonic shit " that's what's wrong with you"
Lol as if it took me more than one sitting to read it...still cool tho...
Yea bro, that sucks, i got schizo at 17, I'm 28 now message me if you want to talk about it
Lol when you know ABC liqour opens at 9 cuz you need that bottle...
I like the theory, for me I feel like my imagination has always been much more potent than others

I live in Florida...I've seen crazy shit just like this...people smoking Wu, gooked out, smoking flakka, that's on another level from crack and meth, they don't even call it meth in Florida any more...they call it ice cream...
Do the obese die?
Yea, I didn't see anything wrong with it...
I like theirs better...
Stupid...he's littering so...I'm going to assault him...
Did she get a third point?
